name: Space Danger
description: If you enjoy space, this is the game for you.  Your character begins on Earth with a couple small quests to begin such as finding the missing cat, entering the house to radio to aliens in space, then going into a cave to receive advice from the sage to help you continue throughout the game.  Then you travel to three different areas of space. You interact with the space dog and alien in one part, then try to get to the ice. Along the way make sure to read the signs to tell you hints and finally once you get to the fire, you have completed the game.
